```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
n <- sample(1:12, 1)

tonic <- sample(100:1000, 1)

ans <- tonic * 2^(n / 12)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 6)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%.0f Hz", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
What frequency is `r n` semitones above `r tonic` Hz?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The frequency is

$$ (`r tonic` \,\mathsf{Hz}) \times 2^{`r n` / 12}= `r fmt(ans, 0)` \,\mathsf{Hz} $$
